short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search UK Charity Commission/Companies House from the right-click menu!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search England & Wales Charity Commission/UK Companies House from the right-click menu! 

- Select any text on any webpage (say, an org name or charity number)
- Right click
- Choose CCCHSearch
- Select either 'Search Charity Commission' or 'Search Companies House'
- It'll take you straight to the search results in a new tab! 

No more faffing about with bookmarks to the search pages or going via a new Google tab! 

It makes a multiple-times-a-day search process for fundraisers and charity pros 10 seconds faster each time
